name: ZOETIS
goal: Zoetis discovers, develops, manufactures and markets veterinary vaccines and medicines, complemented by diagnostic products and genetic tests, biodevices and supported by a range of services. Zoetis serves veterinarians, livestock producers and people who raise and care for farm and companion animals.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Enlargement, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: EU Animal welfare policy; proposal for a Regulation on Veterinay medicinal products; proposal for a Regulation on the manufacture, placing on the market and use of medicated feed; EU Framework program for research & innovation; organic farming regulation; regulation on Mercury; EU Regulation on transparency and sustainability of the EU risk assessment in the food chain; Strategic approach on pharmaceuticals in the environment; Brexit; Emerging Infectious Diseases
